pageContext.claim: “I don't know if you saw, the poll just came out, we're up three in Michigan. And I think we're up a lot more. You know, they give you the fake polls...We're up in Florida. Up four. Up four. You know, I'm watching these guys, the way they talk, the polls, 'Oh, they're down 25 in Michigan.' I said, 'No, we're gonna win Michigan. No.' No, I kid when I say 25, but they, they put numbers...Well, right now we're leading in almost everywhere.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump consistently trailed Biden in the polls throughout the duration of the election, according to the polling gurus at FiveThirtyEight.
